doc.author: 徐发球
doc.description: 查询工单订阅的信息插入到Moniter

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SmsSubscribeToMoniter.person
sqlquery.select: --派发给人的订阅查询 select n.noticeid,n.taskid,n.baseid,n.baseschema,n.noticeuserloginname loginname,u.mobile,n.content,1 isfilter from bs_t_wf_notice n, bs_t_sm_user u where n.noticeuserloginname= u.loginname and n.issent = 0 and n.createtime>(#sys_datetime#-600)

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SmsSubscribeToMoniter.person_bak
sqlquery.select: --派发给人的订阅查询 select n.noticeid,n.taskid,n.baseid,n.baseschema,n.noticeuserloginname loginname,u.mobile,n.content,sm.starttime,sm.endtime from bs_t_wf_notice n, bs_t_sm_smsorderform sm, bs_t_sm_user u where n.baseaction = sm.formaction and n.noticeuserloginname=sm.loginname and n.baseschema=sm.formschema and n.noticeuserloginname= u.loginname and sm.status=1 and n.issent = 0 and n.createtime>(#sys_datetime#-600) --and n.baseschema='WF4:TJ_EOMS_Task_Province'

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SmsSubscribeToMoniter.group
sqlquery.select: --派给组的订阅查询 select n.noticeid,n.taskid,n.baseid,n.baseschema ,u.loginname,u.mobile, n.content,sm.starttime,sm.endtime from bs_t_wf_notice n, bs_t_sm_smsorderform sm, bs_t_sm_user u, bs_t_sm_userdep dp where n.noticegroupid = dp.depid and dp.userid = u.pid and u.loginname=sm.loginname and n.baseaction = sm.formaction and n.baseschema=sm.formschema and n.issent = 0 and sm.status=1 and n.createtime>#sys_datetime#-600

sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_SmsSubscribeToMoniter.role
sqlquery.select:
--派给角色
select n.noticeid,n.taskid,n.baseid,n.baseschema ,u.loginname,u.mobile, n.content,sm.starttime,sm.endtime from bs_t_wf_notice n, bs_t_wf_roleuser ru ,bs_t_sm_user u ,bs_t_sm_smsorderform sm where n.noticegroupid = ru.childroleid and ru.Loginname=u.loginname and n.baseschema=sm.formschema and n.baseaction=sm.formaction and ru.loginname=sm.loginname and n.noticetype='ROLE' and n.issent = 0 and sm.status=1 and n.createtime>#sys_datetime#-600
